Instance.description: Social group that registers to listen for a tuned statistic. When the statistic changes we will send a UI message notifying the value and current decay of the statistic.

TunableTuple.name: interrogation_end_interaction_data
TunableTuple.description: Tunable information corresponding at the interaction that will be pushed when the interrogation is done. All these tunables are required.

Tunable.name: interrogation_end_interaction
Tunable.description: The affordance to push on from the officer (Actor of interaction) to the suspect (TargetSim of interaction).

TunableTuple.name: interrogation_statistic_threshold
TunableTuple.description: The threshold that the interrogation stat value will be compared to. If the threshold returns true then the interrogation end interaction will be pushed from the interrogation actor to its interrogation target.

TunableEnum.name: comparison
TunableEnum.description: The comparison to perform against the value.

Tunable.name: interrogation_statistic
Tunable.description: Statistic to listen to display on the interrogation progress.
